COMMENT1: Note If you are not going to use the `npm run autowatch` command to compile, then delete the macOS.minVersion line below
plugin.name: Main Heading/Title for your plugin collection (e.g. Note Helpers)
plugin.description: More descriptive subtitle for your collection of commands.
plugin.author: Your Name
plugin.url: Put a link to a web page or your github readme file here, and it will be displayed as the 'website' in the plugin preference pane to give users more info on the plugin before/after install, e.g.  https://github.com/dwertheimer/Noteplan-plugins/blob/main/np.plugin-flow-skeleton/readme.md

plugin.commands.name: shortPluginCommandHere
plugin.commands.description: description goes here. displays in plugins install panel
alias: other names you want your plugin
to be found when a user searches
